text: was a Japanese football club which played in Japan Soccer League. It was founded in 1932 and was disbanded in 1993. ==Club name== *1932-1988; Nippon Kokan SC *1988-1993; NKK SC ==League position== *1967 : JSL Division 1 - 7th *1968 : JSL Division 1 - 8th *1969 : JSL Division 1 - 6th *1970 : JSL Division 1 - 7th *1971 : JSL Division 1 - 7th *1972 : JSL Division 1 - 5th *1973 : JSL Division 1 - 9th *1974 : JSL Division 1 - 7th *1975 : JSL Division 1 - 9th *1976 : JSL Division 1 - 6th *1977 : JSL Division 1 - 8th *1978 : JSL Division 1 - 7th *1979 : JSL Division 1 - 9th *1980 : JSL Division 2 - 4th *1981 : JSL Division 2 - 1st *1982 : JSL Division 1 - 10th *1983 : JSL Division 2 - 1st *1984 : JSL Division 1 - 8th *1985/86 : JSL Division 1 - 2nd *1986/87 : JSL Division 1 - 2nd *1987/88 : JSL Division 1 - 2nd *1988/89 : JSL Division 1 - 10th *1989/90 : JSL Division 1 - 8th *1990/91 : JSL Division 1 - 12th *1991/92 : JSL Division 2 - 4th *1992 : Football League - 10th *1993 : Football League - 3rd / Division 2 Category:1932 establishments in Japan Category:1990s disestablishments in Japan Category:1993 disestablishments Category:Defunct football clubs Category:Football clubs in Kanagawa Prefecture
title: NKK SC
